job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related field

jd: From: Venkat, KK Software Associates venkat@kksoftwareassociates.com Reply to: venkat@kksoftwareassociates.com We are hiring CIAM framework Business Architect for one of my Client in Location: Chicago(Naperville), IL interesting candidates please send resumes to venkat@kksoftwareassociates.com (614) 335-4419 Position: CIAM framework Business ArchitectLocation: Chicago(Naperville), ILVisa status: : Strictly Don’t share F1, OPT, OPT EAD, L2 EAD and H4 EAD work permit Bachelors or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related field.10+ years of related experience as a Business Architect or similar role, with a focus on CIAM framework (such as OAuth, OpenID Connect & SAML)Strong knowledge of security principles, including authentication, authentication and encryption.Experience with CIAM technologies, such as Okta or Ping Identity.Familiarity with regulatory requirements, such as GDPR and CCPA, and their impact on CIAMProficiency in translating business requirements into technical solutions and collaborating with IT teams for implementation.Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills
